name: everything-antigravity (krishnakanthb13)
description: [项目级] Welcome to the central repository for the **Antigravity** ecosystem. This project houses a collection of AI Agents, Task Skills, and Coding Rules designed to enhance autonomous coding workflows.。来源: https://github.com/krishnakanthb13/everything-antigravity

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content: Everything Antigravity provides a standardized framework for building and maintaining software using AI agents. It bridges the gap between high-level architectural decisions and low-level coding implementation.

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content: There are two ways to install the components from this repository:

name: everything-antigravity/agents 模块
description: [模块级] everything-antigravity 项目的 agents 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/krishnakanthb13/everything-antigravity

genes.title: agents 模块说明
genes.content:
Specialized personas designed to handle specific stages of the software development lifecycle.
- **Architect**: System design and scalability.
- **Code Reviewer**: Quality assurance and security.
- **Planner**: Task decomposition and roadmapping.
